title: Failed to update eth1 cache: FailedToInsertDeposit(NonConsecutive { log_index: 1328, expected: 0 })"
body:
## Description

`lighthouse bn --staking --metrics`
```
Nov 30 18:42:19.193 INFO Lighthouse started                      version: Lighthouse/v1.0.1-5a3b94cb
Nov 30 18:42:19.195 INFO Configured for network                  name: mainnet
Nov 30 18:42:19.195 INFO Data directory initialised              datadir: /home/ethereum/.lighthouse/mainnet
Nov 30 18:42:19.195 WARN Running HTTP server on port 5052
Nov 30 18:42:19.201 INFO Deposit contract                        address: 0x00000000219ab540356cbb839cbe05303d7705fa, deploy_block: 11184524
Nov 30 18:42:19.260 INFO Starting from known genesis state       service: beacon
Nov 30 18:42:19.421 INFO Block production enabled                method: json rpc via http, endpoints: ["http://localhost:8545"]
Nov 30 18:42:21.048 INFO Beacon chain initialized                head_slot: 0, head_block: 0x4d61…9360, head_state: 0x7e76…2c2b, service: beacon
Nov 30 18:42:21.049 INFO Timer service started                   service: node_timer
Nov 30 18:42:21.051 INFO UPnP Attempting to initialise routes    service: UPnP
Nov 30 18:42:21.057 INFO Libp2p Service                          peer_id: 16Uiu2HAm2CJn3dYcWgrwVsGov3uiNg24JNkCgMWSkoV8JdNaENq4, service: libp2p
Nov 30 18:42:21.063 INFO ENR Initialised                         tcp: Some(9000), udp: None, ip: None, id: 0x76b9..f6f8, seq: 1, enr: enr:-KO4QEIul6Jex2_jyv1yg_HrIR1xWGLKyzgVWK2uGQzSISjJNKz7Ed2B63EfvQvqYAZKeKvvMT8PNTXnEQ6FodMVMw8Bh2F0dG5ldHOIAAAAAAAAAACEZXRoMpC1MD8qAAAAAP__________gmlkgnY0iXNlY3AyNTZrMaECZJVIv9neYDqAGU9KstBFt6Ue-lBPtEvYcFMXPKtUWo-DdGNwgiMo, service: libp2p
Nov 30 18:42:21.068 INFO Listening established                   address: /ip4/0.0.0.0/tcp/9000/p2p/16Uiu2HAm2CJn3dYcWgrwVsGov3uiNg24JNkCgMWSkoV8JdNaENq4, service: libp2p
Nov 30 18:42:21.087 INFO HTTP API started                        listen_address: 127.0.0.1:5052
Nov 30 18:42:21.087 INFO Metrics HTTP server started             listen_address: 127.0.0.1:5054
Nov 30 18:42:21.088 INFO Waiting for genesis                     wait_time: 18 hrs 18 mins, peers: 0, service: slot_notifier
Nov 30 18:42:21.644 INFO Address updated                         udp_port: 9000, ip: xxx, service: libp2p
Nov 30 18:42:25.201 INFO Sync state updated                      new_state: Synced, old_state: Stalled, service: sync
Nov 30 18:42:25.201 INFO Subscribed to topics                    topics: [BeaconBlock, BeaconAggregateAndProof, VoluntaryExit, ProposerSlashing, AttesterSlashing], service: network
Nov 30 18:42:27.641 ERRO Failed to update eth1 cache             error: Failed to update eth1 cache: "FailedToInsertDeposit(NonConsecutive { log_index: 1328, expected: 0 })", retry_millis: 7000, service: eth1_rpc
Nov 30 18:42:31.187 INFO UPnP not available                      error: IO error: Resource temporarily unavailable (os error 11), service: UPnP
Nov 30 18:42:33.090 INFO Waiting for genesis                     wait_time: 18 hrs 17 mins, peers: 5, service: slot_notifier
```

My openethereum node is synced. 
```
Nov 30 18:54:11 user[1528]: 2020-11-30 18:54:11  Imported #11361606 0x97f4…5a0e (219 txs, 12.47 Mgas, 657 ms, 42.94 KiB)
Nov 30 18:54:26 user[1528]: 2020-11-30 18:54:26  Imported #11361607 0x1ea2…9829 (222 txs, 12.47 Mgas, 493 ms, 38.78 KiB)
Nov 30 18:54:35 user[1528]: 2020-11-30 18:54:35    #11341077   26/50 peers    533 KiB chain  0 bytes queue  RPC:  0 conn,    0 req/s, 5822 µs
Nov 30 18:54:47 user[1528]: 2020-11-30 18:54:47  Imported #11361608 0x63f8…545e (211 txs, 12.48 Mgas, 480 ms, 36.92 KiB)
Nov 30 18:55:05 user[1528]: 2020-11-30 18:55:05    #11344711   26/50 peers    572 KiB chain  0 bytes queue  RPC:  0 conn,    0 req/s, 5822 µs
Nov 30 18:55:07 user[1528]: 2020-11-30 18:55:07  Imported #11361609 0x7341…37c8 (140 txs, 12.47 Mgas, 818 ms, 34.33 KiB)
Nov 30 18:55:22 user[1528]: 2020-11-30 18:55:22  Imported #11361610 0xe265…2ab8 (172 txs, 12.49 Mgas, 509 ms, 39.42 KiB)
Nov 30 18:55:40 user[1528]: 2020-11-30 18:55:40    #11349951   26/50 peers    782 KiB chain  0 bytes queue  RPC:  0 conn,    0 req/s, 5822 µs
```

Not sure what the problem is. Maybe a port issue? Do I need do make UPnP available in my router's settings?

On my staking machine:

`ufw status numbered`
```
Status: active

     To                         Action      From
     --                         ------      ----
[ 1] 9000/tcp                   ALLOW IN    Anywhere                  
[ 2] 9000/udp                   ALLOW IN    Anywhere                  
[ 3] 13000/tcp                  ALLOW IN    Anywhere                  
[ 4] 12000/udp                  ALLOW IN    Anywhere                  
[ 5] 30303/tcp                  ALLOW IN    Anywhere                  
[ 6] 30303/udp                  ALLOW IN    Anywhere                  
[ 7] 9000/tcp (v6)              ALLOW IN    Anywhere (v6)             
[ 8] 9000/udp (v6)              ALLOW IN    Anywhere (v6)             
[ 9] 13000/tcp (v6)             ALLOW IN    Anywhere (v6)             
[10] 12000/udp (v6)             ALLOW IN    Anywhere (v6)             
[11] 30303/tcp (v6)             ALLOW IN    Anywhere (v6)             
[12] 30303/udp (v6)             ALLOW IN    Anywhere (v6)             
```

## Version

lighthouse --version
Lighthouse v1.0.1-5a3b94cb
BLS Library: blst

(same with v1.0.2)

rustc --version
rustc 1.48.0 (7eac88abb 2020-11-16)

## Present Behaviour

I get `error: Failed to update eth1 cache: "FailedToInsertDeposit(NonConsecutive { log_index: 1328, expected: 0 })", retry_millis: 7000, service: eth1_rpc` and very high CPU usage.

I had a look at https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/issues/1209, do you think I can fix this by resyncing openethereum?

## Expected Behaviour

There should be no error.

Hey @FabianSchuessler what sync mode did you use for open ethereum?
also, what does this command return?
```
curl --request POST 'http://localhost:8545' \
    --header 'Content-type: application/json' \
    --data-raw '{
    "jsonrpc":"2.0",
    "method":"eth_syncing",
    "params":[],
    "id":1
}'
```

I just followed the coincashew guide (https://www.coincashew.com/coins/overview-eth/guide-or-how-to-setup-a-validator-on-eth2-mainnet) to install openethereum & lighthouse.

Currently I am running Lighthouse with Infura as endpoint. Is it possible to start a second Lighthouse beacon chain with a different endpoint to test my openethereum application without messing up my validator? I guess it might be best to stop Lighthouse and then immediately restart it with both openethereum and Infura as endpoints?

```
curl --request POST 'http://localhost:8545' \
>     --header 'Content-type: application/json' \
>     --data-raw '{
>     "jsonrpc":"2.0",
>     "method":"eth_syncing",
>     "params":[],
>     "id":1
> }'
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","result":false,"id":1}
```

I am thinking about just cleaning up and resyncing openethereum and then retrying Lighthouse with openethereum as endpoint.

Maybe somehow my deposit logs in openethereum are messed up?

Here some more logs:


@FabianSchuessler we have seen these issues with missing logs with nethermind mostly. Not so much with openethereum. 

You can use this script here to check if your OE node has any missing logs.
https://github.com/pawanjay176/deposits-checker/blob/master/main.py
Ping me (pawan in LH discord) if you have any issues.

I stopped syncing openethereum so it doesn't go until the end. Not sure what went wrong. My first try syncing openethereum failed because of the bad block error. The second time this error happened. Now I am switching over to geth. This error was probably related to openethereum and not lighthouse.
